edu.cwru.sepia.agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.agent.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CombatAgent, MatlabAgent, MimicAgent, ResourceCollectionAgent, ScriptedGoalAgent, SimpleAgent1, SimpleAgent2, VisualAgent

    public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The base type for any agent that can interact with the Sepia environment.
    Author:
    Tim
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
